00044 class DbjAccessPlan
00045 {
00046   public:
00048     virtual ~DbjAccessPlan();
00049 
00056     enum NodeType {
00057         // CREATE TABLE
00058         CreateTableStmt,
00059         Table,
00060         Column,
00061         DataType,
00062         NotNullOption,
00063         // DROP TABLE
00064         DropTableStmt,
00065         // CREATE INDEX
00066         CreateIndexStmt,
00067         Index,
00068         UniqueIndex,
00069         IndexType,      // Hash/B-Baum
00070         // DROP INDEX
00071         DropIndexStmt,
00072         // INSERT
00073         InsertStmt,
00074         Row,
00075         IntegerValue,
00076         VarcharValue,
00077         NullValue,
00078         // UPDATE
00079         UpdateStmt,
00080         Assignment,
00081         // DELETE
00082         DeleteStmt,
00083         // SELECT
00084         SelectStmt,
00085         Projections,    // Spaltennamen in SELECT
00086         Sources,        // Tabellennamen in FROM
00087         WhereClause,
00088         Predicate,
00089         LogicalOperation,// AND, OR
00090         Comparison,     // =, <, >, <=, >=, <>
00091         Negation,       // NOT
00092         // COMMIT
00093         CommitStmt,
00094         // ROLLBACK
00095         RollbackStmt
00096     };

00260     void setNext(DbjAccessPlan *neighbor)
00261           {
00262               if (next && next->prev == this) {
00263                   next->prev = NULL;
00264               }
00265               next = neighbor;
00266               if (neighbor) {
00267                   neighbor->prev = this;
00268               }
00269           }
00270 
00284     void setSon(DbjAccessPlan *newSon)
00285           {
00286               if (son && son->parent == this) {
00287                   son->parent = NULL;
00288               }
00289               son = newSon;
00290               if (newSon) {
00291                   newSon->parent = this;
00292               }
00293           }
00294 
00307     void addNext(DbjAccessPlan *neighborNode)
00308           {
00309               if (neighborNode != NULL) {
00310                   if (next != NULL) {
00311                       next->addNext(neighborNode);
00312                   }
00313                   else {
00314                       next = neighborNode;
00315                       neighborNode->prev = this;
00316                   }
00317               }
00318           }
00319 
00332     void addSon(DbjAccessPlan *sonNode)
00333           {
00334               if (sonNode != NULL) {
00335                   if (son != NULL) {
00336                       son->addNext(sonNode);
00337                   }
00338                   else {
00339                       son = sonNode;
00340                       sonNode->parent = this;
00341                   }
00342               }
00343           }
00344
